name: mini.css
description: A minimal, responsive, style-agnostic CSS framework.

scripts.build-mini-default: node-sass src/flavors/mini-default.scss dist/mini-default.css --output-style expanded && node-sass src/flavors/mini-default.scss dist/mini-default.min.css --output-style compressed
scripts.build-mini-dark: node-sass src/flavors/mini-dark.scss dist/mini-dark.css --output-style expanded && node-sass src/flavors/mini-dark.scss dist/mini-dark.min.css --output-style compressed
scripts.build-mini-nord: node-sass src/flavors/mini-nord.scss dist/mini-nord.css --output-style expanded && node-sass src/flavors/mini-nord.scss dist/mini-nord.min.css --output-style compressed
scripts.build-flavors: npm run build-mini-default && npm run build-mini-dark && npm run build-mini-nord

author: Angelos Chalaris (chalarangelo@gmail.com)
